data.message: I'm still in need of some help please. My Facebook has been disabled for a while now and I need to be able to get back on it please I've sent several appeals with no response

replies.message: Hi Shauna. Due to the volume of appeals we receive, it may take us some time to get to yours. We appreciate your patience! -Stephanie

What is the time frame normally?  I am lost and unable to keep up with my kids sports teams ans school activities as its all done on facebook.  :(  I do not think I did anything to violate which is what I put in my appeal I've sent several pills with no response. Is there a way to escalate? Thank you for your quick response however I do appreciate it
I already appealed to but no response
How long ago was yours disabled?

Me too :( I've been submitting at least to appeal the day and nothing I keep getting told on these comments by the Facebook people they're overloaded. All I really want is my 10-year for the photos back
I already gave them my passport ID and I apologize to them not to violate again. No response at all

I'm not even sure what I did to violate their terms literally have not done anything wrong. I have three kids two of which I have 10 years worth of photos of on Facebook literally all I want to do is get those photos back and I'll start a new Facebook. I have heard though if you log in as long as it doesn't say permanently disabled but eventually you can get your Facebook back it just takes some time to process it and they're supposedly really backed up
What did they reply on your email?
Nothing via email... just on here
They did reply somehow "Unfortunately we do not offer support for blocked or disabled accounts from this email alias" I feel depress right now
I just went ahead and made a new one for now once they undisable my last account I'll go back to it
I think Facebook doesn't care of our concerns
